subject:

> Log:
> Fix bug #4759 reported by Raul .
> "N" is not a valid format entry for ber_printf, should be "n"

Are you sure about this?  I thought volker looked up 'N' the
other day and it was valid in OpenLDAP.  Maybe my memory is
wrong though.



jerry
